info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 29 at 12:18PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS CONTINUE ACROSS NEW LONDON COUNTY IN CONNECTICUT AND SUFFOLK COUNTY ON LONG ISLAND... Bands of heavy snow at the rate of 2 to 3 inches per hour, accompanied by north winds gusting between 40 and 50 mph, will continue to produce blizzard conditions, with visibility less than one quarter mile, and considerable blowing and drifting of snow. The snow will accumulate so rapidly that it will be extremely difficult for road crews to keep roads clear. Travel is strongly discouraged! If you must travel, bring a winter survival kit. If you become stranded, stay with your vehicle.
